__e: - Your words? Okay, she's weaker, but it doesn't matter.
And you're always so soft and weak when it comes to her.
For the first time in my life I feel less than I did yesterday.
He's going to seem fine, but as his heart gets worse, he will become increasingly fatigued, and he will sleep more and more, until one day he will fall asleep, and he won't wake up.
- Well, I'm trying to, but the closer I seem to get, the weaker the scent becomes it's like, I don't know, like there's blood all over the place.
If that signal weakens even a little, I want to know about it immediately.
Your horse is weakening, Mr. Hopkins, and you know it.
Since I was losing my grip on power, I tried hard to quit.
And he'll get weaker, and we have to be kind to him.

When the enemy has overwhelming superiority on land, at sea and in the air... and continues to grow stronger with every hour... while we grow weaker at the same rate... that to me is a crisis by any standards that I understand. A crisis that should be examined promptly and realistically.
See, I've been watching you grow weaker for some time now.
The enemy will only grow stronger... while we grow weaker.
